WorkItem.Description:
On my media center I've set Windows to use bigger fonts because I'm sitting further away from the screen, but Rawr dialogs are chopped off at the edges now.
Â 
Please try to make the GUI and all texts scale dynamically around font size.
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr GUI doesn't scale with Windows font size

Comments.Message: WinForms' implementation of GUI scaling with font size is flawed; we will not be making adjustments for this. Rawr3 does not use WinForms, so doesn't have this issue. In the mean time, I suggest you fix the font/dpi settings to use standard sizes.

Thanks for the quick response, and eagerly awaiting Rawr3 :)

Not sure if I'm going to use the workaround, I selected large fonts for a reason. I'm already happy it's going to be fixed soon in Rawr.
As an alternative to larger font, you can try a higher contrast font system, I've found that has helped a lot of people instead of making funky sizes in Windows.
